speaker: Alice
text: Hey Bob! Long time no see. How was your summer holiday? Did you end up going anywhere exciting?

speaker: Bob
text: Alice! Great to see you too. Yeah, it was fantastic, thanks! We went down to the coast, rented a little cottage right near the beach for two weeks. Pure relaxation.

speaker: Alice
text: Oh, that sounds absolutely heavenly! I'm so jealous. Was the weather good? Did you get much swimming done?

speaker: Bob
text: Mostly glorious sunshine! A couple of cloudy mornings, but perfect for lazy breakfasts. We swam almost every day, built some truly epic sandcastles with the kids, and just enjoyed the downtime. How about you? What did you get up to?

speaker: Alice
text: Sounds idyllic! Well, mine was a bit different. I went hiking in the mountains up north. Completely disconnected,  barely any phone signal, which was actually quite nice for a change.

speaker: Bob
text: Wow, that's adventurous! Was it tough going? I always imagine hiking holidays are quite strenuous.

speaker: Alice
text: Some parts were challenging, yes, but the views were absolutely worth it. Crisp mountain air, stunning landscapes... it really clears your head. We stayed in small lodges along the way. Very different from your beach trip, but equally refreshing in its own way.

speaker: Bob
text: I can imagine. It's amazing how different types of breaks can recharge you. One day lounging by the sea, the next conquering a mountain peak!

speaker: Alice
text: Exactly! It's all about the change of scenery, I think. Anyway, glad you had a good time. We should catch up properly soon and swap photos!

speaker: Bob
text: Definitely! Sounds like a plan. Good to see you, Alice!
